key_risks: Financial instability with consistent losses and reliance on government subsidies
Technological and competitive risks from alternative clean energy solutions
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to dependence on rare earth metals
Regulatory dependence on government policies and incentives
controversies: Shareholder lawsuits and investigations due to significant stock decline
Speculative trading and short-squeeze activity affecting stock volatility
environmental_issues: Dependence on rare earth metals and critical materials for fuel cell production
social_issues: Workforce reduction and operational restructuring impacting employees
governance_issues: Concerns about corporate governance and transparency due to stock decline and lawsuits
